update.foreach: update Price set AdultPrice = #{item.AdultPrice},OldPrice = #{item.OldPrice},BabyPrice = #{item.BabyPrice},ChildPrice = #{item.ChildPrice} where Id = #{item.Id}

mapper.select: select a.Id as id,b.LineName,convert(varchar(20),a.OutDate,23) as OutDate,a.AdultPrice,a.OldPrice,a.BabyPrice,a.ChildPrice from Price a,Line b where convert(varchar,a.OutDate,120) like #{_OutDate} and b.LineName like #{_LineName} Order by a.OutDate desc

select b.LineName as 'lineName',convert(char(10),a.OutDate,120) as 'outDate',a.AdultPrice as 'adultPrice',a.OldPrice as 'oldPrice', a.BabyPrice as 'babyPrice',a.ChildPrice as 'childPrice' from Price a join Line b on a.LineId = b.Id where a.Id = #{Id}
